text: Working from home in the morning while new carpeting is put down. Let me know if there's any action items that come out of standup this morning. I'll be in the office around 1

Just caught up with Josh.

We’re making good progress testing various components.  

Touch
Sound
Wiring
Lights (out of scope? dotdotdash) 

Today, let’s proceed testing out some new wiring ideas and speakers.  

By end of day, I’d like for Josh to send Robert an email with the various components we’ve tested to give him an idea of overall footprint.  I think the product is best served if the designers can start folding these considerations in now.  

Ideally, we start digging into software and logic needs next week.
have we received any info about either DotDotDash and Cymaspace?
zero, i just followed up on our need for a contact list.
ok got this rs-485 board working on a raspberry pi (model A but shouldn't matter)
seems like a viable option if we want to go with point to point wiring
ordered a 100ft cable just to see if it would work. arrives monday. apparently that's the maximum run length for rs-485
also, tested nice german integrated capacitive touch sensor on the bench. range seems very limited maybe 15-20mm unless I'm training it wrong

This seems like a good option for RGBW lights. We need to order these soon however. An estimate is that these would get here beginning of January if we ordered this week. <https://www.aliexpress.com/store/product/SK6812-RGBW-4-channel-Build-in-IC-30-60-144-leds-pixles-m-individual-addressable-led/1854714_32531679849.html>
